trans-unit.source: In standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV, Production Order lines are always sorted by level. Most of the time this is not the same sorting that is shown in Document BOMs/Construction Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV, Production Order lines are always sorted by level.
Most of the time this is not the same sorting that is shown in Document BOMs/Construction Orders.

trans-unit.source: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 and Assembly 4 are part of Main assembly 1, and Assembly 5 is part of Main assembly 2 in the Construction BOM.

seg-source.mrk: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 and Assembly 4 are part of Main assembly 1, and Assembly 5 is part of Main assembly 2 in the Construction BOM.

trans-unit.source: : Construction Order highlighting the relation of the assembly lines (level 2) to main assembly lines (level 1)

seg-source.mrk: : Construction Order highlighting the relation of the assembly lines (level 2) to main assembly lines (level 1)

trans-unit.source: When a Production Order is opened, the lines are sorted by level. As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:2" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 – 5 all appear directly behind the Main assembly 2.

seg-source.mrk: When a Production Order is opened, the lines are sorted by level.

As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:2" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 – 5 all appear directly behind the Main assembly 2.

trans-unit.source: : Production Order with lines sorted by level (standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV)

seg-source.mrk: : Production Order with lines sorted by level (standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV)

trans-unit.source: To sort Production Order Lines to match the structure of the Document BOM/Construction Order, use the “Change Sorting” function (Lines FastTab > Line) in the Production Order lines.

seg-source.mrk: To sort Production Order Lines to match the structure of the Document BOM/Construction Order, use the “Change Sorting” function (Lines FastTab > Line) in the Production Order lines.

trans-unit.source: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:3" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 and Assembly 4 are now shown directly behind Main assembly 1, and Assembly 5 is shown directly behind Main assembly 2 in the Production Order lines.

seg-source.mrk: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#:3" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref>, Assembly 3 and Assembly 4 are now shown directly behind Main assembly 1, and Assembly 5 is shown directly behind Main assembly 2 in the Production Order lines.

trans-unit.source: : Production Order with lines sorted with Change Sorting function

seg-source.mrk: : Production Order with lines sorted with Change Sorting function
